sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya adalah seorang pengajar di sekolah.
english translation: "I am a teacher at a school."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia adalah pengelola restoran terkenal.
english translation: "He is the manager of a famous restaurant."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Polisi berhasil menangkap penjahat itu.
english translation: "The police managed to catch the criminal."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kami mencari penutup yang tepat untuk proyek ini.
english translation: "We are looking for the right closure for this project."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia adalah peraga busana terkenal di Paris.
english translation: "She is a famous fashion model in Paris."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Acara peragaan busana akan diadakan besok malam.
english translation: "The fashion show will be held tomorrow night."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kami memeriksa peralatan sebelum memulai pekerjaan.
english translation: "We are checking the equipment before starting the work."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Negara-negara itu terlibat dalam perang yang panjang.
english translation: "Those countries are involved in a long war."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Aku tidak bisa mengendalikan perasaan ini.
english translation: "I can't control this feeling."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Terdapat banyak perbedaan antara kedua produk tersebut.
english translation: "There are many differences between the two products."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Perbuatanmu telah menyakiti hati orang lain.
english translation: "Your actions have hurt someone's feelings."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia memiliki tingkat percaya diri yang tinggi.
english translation: "She has a high level of self-confidence."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Perdana Menteri akan memberikan pidato penting besok.
english translation: "The Prime Minister will give an important speech tomorrow."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Aku harus pergi sekarang.
english translation: "I have to go now."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong berikan perhatian lebih pada detail-detail kecil.
english translation: "Please pay more attention to the small details."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Atasan memberikan perintah kepada karyawan-karyawan.
english translation: "The boss gives commands to the employees."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Perjalanan kami sangat menyenangkan.
english translation: "Our journey was very enjoyable."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia menghadiri pesta perkawinan saudaranya.
english translation: "She attended her sibling's wedding party."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya senang berkenalan denganmu.
english translation: "I'm glad to meet you."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Permisi, bisakah saya melewati?
english translation: "Excuse me, can I pass through?"
